reviews.review: Es muy bueno lo recomiendo

Some of the best co-op experience you can have in gaming.

Pros: 
MANY maps, from user created to developer
Very rewarding progression system
Awesome weapons
Gory
Developers actually care and still update it

Cons:
Some maps are not so great, just find another 
Too many DLC for weapons that you don't even need.


Great game,

отличный хоррор  на выживание. очень продуманная прокачка перков и приличное количество разнообразного  оружия! игра быстро затягивает несмотря на уже н новую гарфику. в общем киллинг флор отличный вариант поиграть в команде))
Достаточно неплохо. С друзьями вообще каеф.

Ce jeu est fait pour les personnes souhaitant jouer avec leurs amis !
Du fun, du mutant, des armes, des classes, rien de mieux pour passer une soirée amusante !
Jouez-y ! :D

I blew up zombies using bombs thrown by a golden miniature-whale-shaped grenade launcher whilst playing as a chicken terminator (ChickeNator). Which is awesome.

The bad points: Almost every point of what I just said that sounded awesome was DLC. DLC is cheap on this, though.

That basically sums the game up.

PS: Some elements of the game remind me of House of the Dead 3 and 4 (Biotics Lab Map and general enemy design). This makes it even more awesome.

Si vous aimez les survival horror ce jeu est fait pour vous ! 
Meme si ce jeu commence a dater un peu ^^il reste tout de meme genial, simple mais efficace § 
Je vous recommande donc ce jeu pour vous defoulez apres un dure journée de travail !!
Soooo I need to review something. I like this game, its fun, doin some achievement hunting for it. I recommend for others, play with friends, and enjoy.
Игра супер!!!

Довольно увлекательная игра. Но в неё не поиграешь целый день, так как надоедает. Можно скоротать время.
 Так вот.
В игре присутствуют несколько видов "очистителей". И у каждово свои "+" и "-" Присутствуют волны зомби, между ними вам доступен магазин. В котором вам доступны различные виды оружия, деньги капают с убийства зомби. Можно настроить на кол-во волн. Так вот, на последней волне будет босс. После которого и решиться, выживет ваш исход: жизнь или смерть.
Оценка игрушке 8 из 10
I looove this game! Cant wait until KF2 is coming!

YES YES YES YES YES. GET IT. NOW. The game is literally addicting. Meet the original Zombie Game. The inspirerer of Left 4 Dead, the predecessor to CoD Zombies, the KING of Zombie Horror.

All of the enemies have great AI and work together well; teamwork is required to survive to the end. The weapons are inspired and beautifully shaped even if they're a few years old. There isn't a single bug to be seen due to it's siplicity and the game provides multiple playstyles for your zombie-killing pleasure.

The ONLY reason i would suggest not buying this game is because there is a sequel coming out in probably less than a year (however there is no garuntee that it will be better or even remotely different other than graphical fideility). GET IT, IT"S CHEAP!!!! IT'S GREAT!!!! REPLAYABILITY OVER 9000!!!!!!!


EDIT: I take it back, there is indeed A bug. Upon startup the game can fail to find a display mode and crash continiously. I currently don't know of a permanent fix, althought occasionally validating the cache will temporarily work.

I think this may be the most fun cooperative survival game I've ever played. I find it more appealing and immersive than Left 4 Dead, and the fact of the matter is, Killing Floor is much more built around mutliplayer. Everyone is nice, hacks don't tend to be an issue and servers are great. No matter how repetitive the gameplay can get, it just never seems to be the same game every lobby or round, and that's one of the most important attributes of a truly good game. :)
Muy entretenido para jugar con amigos, aguantando oleadas y oleadas contra siniestros enemigos. Lo mejor la mujer de las armas grandes y bonitas.

Best FPS I've laid my hands on.

❤Balanced gameplay
❤Generally good community 
❤Witty remarks from characters throughout gameplay
❤You feel like you actually improve the more you play, and you evolve into something that isn't a noob
❤Very few glitches to be had
❤Lovely variety of weapons to choose from
❤Reasonably priced DLC, and it doesn't make the game unbalanced for other players who don't own said DLC

Definitely recommended if you enjoy FPS games.
i recommed this game it has given me hours of fun
Really repetitive, spiky difficulty, boring boss-fight. An amateur version of Left 4 Dead with a couple of nice ideas that unfortunately are implemented badly.

I bought this game when in 2009, on my brother's recommendation. The first time I played it, I was completely awe-struck by the solid, deadly feel of the weapons. From the way the character handles their firearms to the sound when they fire is on an entirely new level for the FPS genre. Nothing else comes close.
It is repetitive:
Kill stuff, earn money, buy better guns, rinse and repeat.
However, if you like playing shooters, you will love this game. You will also wonder why every other games suck at making guns feel deadly when Killing Floor makes it look so simple.

Bottom line:
MUST HAVE

" Uma obra prima escrita com horror, sangue e cooperação"
9,5/10,0

One of the best survival co-op game in the world.

In my eye's this is a great game! if you like being able to shoot and blow up ugly Zeds, and see a shower of blood and limbs this is your game! a critique of this game has been that it does not have replay value, but i have hours upon hours in this game and i am not even close to being bored. Tripwire is a great company, as they listen to the community and ALL the maps that have come out have been FREE, yes let me repeat, Free, along with a array of weapons. now they do sell Character Skins and weapons for DLC content, and may seem a tad pricy to you, but i have no trouble supporting this company. all in all its a great game, and i recommend you get it!

Esse jogo é especialmente pra jogar COOP, singleplayer você vai ficar de saco cheio rapidão, porque basicamente o jogo é um survival que a unica coisa que muda de uma partida pra outra é o mapa. Agora em COOP da para passar um bom tempo com os amigos, tentando passar em dificuldades mais altas, baixando mapas do Workshop. Da pra dar umas risadas, as vezes você buga em paredes invisíveis, e o jogo as vezes tem um bug do multiplayer que os monstros ficam invisíveis, e fica injogável!
 Mas é um ótimo jogo COOP. Recomendo para jogar com amigos.
amazing

There is no common courtesy in this game seriously.
You're either better off alone or staying in a group whose organized.
If the team isn't organized and everyone isn't doing their part you better run off.
Defend yourselves or be taken down by ZEDS
Overall just have a team who knows what they're doing.
The game is overall amazing with friends and even by yourself if you like impressing people.

Игра хороша. Есть неного графона, отличный ко-оп, некая даже атмосфера. И да, мясорубка и отлетающие конечности.
Но колличество DLC... На момент написания они стоят 3,5к! ПОэтому ставлю "Не рекомендую". Конечно, они не критично меняют игровой процесс (как в случае с Payday 2), но всё же эта та ещё выманивалка денег (за неоновый, мать его, костюм 170р!даже без оружия!). Благо цена бандла (KF+все DLC) не меняется.
Итог, 8/10. Играть с друзьями.
Altamente recomendado.

For all its simplicity, Killing Floor has me coming back again and again to massacre hoards of mutants and get the coolest gear. And that's really all it is. Sure there is "Objective Mode" and custom modes in the workshop but the meat, as it were, of the game is arena like combat against waves of mutants and a final boss. Sounds boring? That's excatly what I thought at first. But as soon as a spawned in with only a pistol and a knife and hordes of zeds coming at me I had no choice but to fire away. And hell, it was fun! When the shop opened i got my assault rifle... and the rest is bloody giblet-infused history.
For all its simplicity, when you get down to it, Killing Floor is a romping stomping bloody good time. 

WOO!! TENOUTTATENBESTGAMEBESTGAME.
(Jontron refrence, you hippies)
Final Score: 8/10

This game is really fun to play and I'd recommend it everyone who hasn't bought this yet, and for those particular people.. what're you waiting for!? Grab that dosh of yours and purchase KF! Of course, it all depends on the team you're with, as if you have people constantly screwing up (LIke people going off on their own a lot and constantly getting killed), it can really hurt your team, but.. The game is still really fun to play. I personally think Scrakes are hilarious to kill. =3=

Very fun and very polished zombie co-op game. different classes to level up, those classes then give u more (slight) perks. I reccomend it

Jeu qui ne pète pas des barres niveau graphismes, mais très amusant ( surtout en groupe, à partir de 2 il devient vraiment drôle d'y jouer ). Très fun et plutôt addictif ( niveau de difficulté grandissant et succès allant de pair avec également ), possibilité de faire progresser son personnage dans une classe de sa préférence ( démolisseur pour les amoureux des explosifs et tireur d'élite pour les amoureux des crânes qui explosent, sont deux jolis exemples des moult possibilités qu'offrent ce jeu ). L'humour est partout présent dans les dialogues ( que ce soit de la part des pnj ou des phrases prédéfinies que peuvent se lancer les joueurs entre eux, en audio ). Univers sombre où le glauque et le drôle se mélangent, je conseille fortement ce jeu qui vous fera passer d'excellents moments à coup sûr ( pour peu que vous aimiez le survival horror évidemment :p ).
Meilleur jeux de zombie apres L4D2 tres fun je le recomende a tous se qui aime déglungué des zombie

Killing Floor is another one of those "Zombie" games that try to be original by saying the "Zombies" are just braindead genetic organisms. That can't save your originality. Zombies are zombies. But i digress.
Killing Floor does take an original take on the whole "Zombie Apocalypse" debacle. Instead of meeting 3 strangers and fighting for survival, [i]You (And hopefully, your teammates) have been flown in to "Cleanse" the area of specimens. We'll pay you a huge bounty for doing so, which you can spend in between waves at the merc trader.[/i]
In other words, it's more or less an arena-style game. You even get different classes.

The Field Medic gets faster healing rates and better armor.
The Support Specialist can weld faster and carry more.
The Sharpshooter gets a bonus with pistols and headshots.
The Berzerker gets a bonus with all melee weapons, takes less damage, can't be grabbed, and can stun enemies.
The Firebug gets a bonus with fire weapons.
And the Demolitions gets a bonus with explosives.

The different classes give the game a different vibe, the problem comes when you get to leveling.
Each class has 6 Levels. They start at Level 1, and you gradually have to do more and more damage to get to level 6.
Why level your perks? You get more bonuses, Levels 5&6 actually let you start the game with different weapons.

The game IS another one of those games that shove it's DLC down your esophagus, and before the game starts you're shown an ad for other Tripwire games, but you can just ignore them.

I could go on, if i do, i'll edit the review, but i suppose you can get a good enough idea out of this.
Go buy it.
игра шикарна,кровь,мясо,оружие,вобщем всё что нужно подростковому организму!!!!

日本鯖とＭｏｄがとても充実してました。
脳ミソパーンが楽しくてずっとやってます。

ＦＰＳ視点のラウンド制で、山盛りの怪物？をパーンするゲームです。
なので対戦相手はNPCだけ。でも色々な種類の山盛り怪物がプレイヤー目がけて
歩いたり、走ったり、叫んで来たり、なんかゲロッパしてきたり、ワープしてみたり、火の玉撃ってきたり色々してきます。
彼ら相手に鉛玉でも食ってな！ばりにパンパンします。

なんかクラスがいっぱいありますが、高ランクになるまではどれ選んでも同じです。
なので取り合えずやって自分のスタイルに合いそうなクラスを探しましょう。

ゲームはラウンド制なので、そのラウンドで死んじゃってもマルチなら、他のプレイヤーが決まった数の怪物を倒してくれれば次のラウンドで復活できます。
ソロだとそこで怪物にクッチャクッチャ食べられる様を見られます。

１ラウンドが終わるとトレーダーがうんたら言ってきます。売店です。
赤い矢印、もしくは赤い線のナビを頼りに走ります。ナイフに持ち替えると若干早いよ。
倒した分だけお金がポケットに入ってるのでそれでデッケー銃を買え！みたいな事を言ってくるので買いましょう
売店タイムは時間制限あるのでお早めに。
大体こんな感じの流れて決まったラウンドを乗り越えていくゲームです。
Mapによりますが、最後に博士が一人だけでてきます。ラスボスです。片手にガトリングくっ付けたナイスガイです。
倒せばクリアー、ダメだと博士の高笑いが見られます。


ソロも出来ますが、前述の通り日本鯖がなにやら大量にあるので日本でやる分にはプレイヤーも多い方だと思われます。
Pingの点ではあまりストレスないです。
なのでマルチおススメです。特にボイチャしなきゃならん訳でもなく、V押して出てくる定形文で事足ります。
ダメならアクションだ！フィーリングだ！同じ人間、きっと分りあえる！…ハズ。

Killing floor, a great Survival Horror Co-op shooter.
This is a fun game, but only with others, namely friends who you can Co-operate with through live communcation, because this game is hard.
With a large array of enemies coming at you from all corners, the horror is real but you can fight back with an array of different class specilialites with tons of perks and abilities, the guns feel good and there are lots of them, all the maps are great too. Games can last at least 40minutes long on normal diffuculties alone, trying to do anything above normal is like having a having a fucking deathwish though.

You see, thats where the flaws of the game come into play, it's TOO HARD, diffuculty in games isn't a bad thing, infact it's rare in today's games, but Killing Floor takes it to a new level, you'll start off on beginner diffuculty, this is easy, really easy. Of course it's easy, it's beginner, so you step it up to Normal, you're going to die and die and die unless you have a very compotent team and a high level, doing diffuculties like 'Hell on earth' and 'suicide' will require hours upon hours of constant grinding on lower diffuculties, thats not so fun.

That brings me to the leveling, it's fucked beyond comprehension, there are six, yes, a mere six whole levels for each class, this doesn't seem like a lot right? Oh no...they've stretched it out so you need to grind for fucking days to level up and it gets tedious really fast, I'm begging Killing Floor 2 to fix this god awful leveling mechanic.

My final complaint, the end game wave. 
While the previous waves consist of a seemingly endless wave of mutant variants attacking you from you all angles, the final boss is always the same.
The Patriarch, you fight him alone to start with but he'll summon peions as the fight goes on, once or twice this fight will be fun, but the same enemy, every single time, for every single mission?
Personally I'd like to see some variety in later titles with different end bosses for different missions, fighting the patriarch constantly gets old.

All my complaints aside, this is a great game, one of the best FPS survival shooters I've played, like Left4Dead with more variety and less 'A to B' and like Nazi Zombies but again with more variation and just a thousand times better, the horror is actually present too unlike most Surival shooters.
Killing Floor goes on sale quite a lot so I reccommend you give it a whirl.

This is a totally fun and cheap CO-OP game that's "arcade" and everyone can easily play and understand :)
I saw some people complaining about the DLCs. What I think is, there's "Right DLCs" and "Eletronic Assrape DLCs"
Give TRipware and the game a break, this is a +5 years old game, that is still getting updates and online support. There's a lot of games that lasts 3-4 years and have their online support and servers shut down good.
You buy the DLCs that YOU WANT. In 2008(yes it was playable in 2008) the game launched with 100% content, the DLCs are been launched to keep the game FRESH and ALIVE for all these years. 
Today we're getting 3/5 - 4/5 of the entire game(The Sims, COD, BF, etc) in their launch day.
Oh, and in Steam sales you can adquire this game for $4,00.(there isn't many fun games for this price out there)
So yea, a 9/10 game that's worth of your attention, light for moderate PCs and like I said, FUN :)
